titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance for the restoration and reconstruction of Fort Abraham Lincoln in the State of North Dakota.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 5/17/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with North Dakota to provide financial assistance for the restoration of Fort Abraham Lincoln in Fort Lincoln State Park.
